content: Right now the "description text" for #Is there code for X? says "A. K. A. human-powered library search". Do you think we shouidl change it to "A. K. A. human-powered exact?"? I guess I'm fine with "library search" -- even though it's not a tactic any more, it's still a meaningful phrase.
Yeah, I think the stream is a bit more general than exact?
Hehe, I always understood it as “library search”, not “library_search” anyways.
I think it was intended as a pun initially (not mine!).
